_Comments_: Remove this Field if Login isn't required to Access the Targets
Optionally you're able to change Notifications Content modifying 'Subject' & 'Body'
Content.Subject: {Name} - WebPage Modified
Content.Body: The WebPage {Name} you're tracking has been changed!

_Comments_: Optionally you're able to change Notifier modifying its Credentials
If you do so, 'Less Secure App Access' needs to be enabled in Notifier Gmail Account
Optionally you're able to change SMTP Server modifying 'Host' & 'Port'
